attributes.action: Look into the pitifull pay increase of 1.9% offerd to our nurses over two years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you wish to ensure that Mr Brown never becomes Prim Minister then carry on treating our nurses like slaves. GIVE THEM   A FAIR INCREASE AT ONCE NOT OVER TWO YEARS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
